config.fancyhealthbar.category.title: Fancy Health Bar
config.fancyhealthbar.gravity.descriptio: Controls how fast particles will fall. Negative values will make the particles fly to top of the screen.
config.fancyhealthbar.pixel_size.descrip: Particles will fill SxS pixels, S being this value.
config.fancyhealthbar.slipperiness.descr: Controls how fast particles will go in horizontal direction.
config.fancyhealthbar.title: Fancy health bar configuration screen
config.fancyhealthbar.velocity_multiplie: Controls how fast particles can come out. Higher values will make the particles split into the entire screen while lower values won't make them move at all.
